Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Chicago/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood, 75th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/63rd
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 63rd, Western, 59th & California, due to street blockage near California/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 63rd, Western, 59th, then resume their normal route on California, due to street blockage near California/63rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th- bound Red Line Service Delayed at Sheridan
ShortDescription: 95th- bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to a injured rider. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th- bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to a injured rider.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
